QuestData.Title: You Cannot Run
QuestData.Description:
Zelmany was integral in the fall of my Margrave.
Sin'Dane believes he is trying to gather forces loyal to Kel'Thuzad so they might help him in his next plot.
We should look for clues to his location and then slay him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect clues and then slay Zelmany.
